enabled.title: Enabled Status
enabled.description:
Enables extension manager (requires Node.js/npm).
WARNING: installing untrusted extensions may be unsafe.

disclaimed.title: Disclaimed Status
disclaimed.description: Whether the user understand that extensions managed through this interface run arbitrary code that may be dangerous

npmRegistry.title: NPM Registry
npmRegistry.description: The URI of the NPM registry to use for searching for jupyterlab extensions

npmCdn.title: NPM CDN
npmCdn.description: The URI of the CDN to use for fetching full package data
